import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAdmin } from '../../contexts/AdminContext'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import AnnouncementManager from '../../components/admin/AnnouncementManager'; import GalleryManager from '../../components/admin/GalleryManager'; import EventManager from '../../components/admin/EventManager'; import PrayerManager from '../../components/admin/PrayerManager'; import ImageManager from '../../components/admin/ImageManager'; import { LogOut, Bell, Calendar, Image, Phone, Clock, Users, BarChart3, Settings, Plus, Edit, Trash2, Eye, EyeOff, BookOpen, TrendingUp, Activity, Heart, UserCog, Shield, AlertTriangle, Info } from 'lucide-react'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; type AdminSection = 'overview' | 'announcements' | 'events' | 'gallery' | 'contact' | 'schedule' | 'priests-desk' | 'analytics' | 'prayers' | 'images' | 'users'; const AdminDashboard: React.FC = () => { const { announcements, events, galleryImages, getActiveAnnouncement, getPublishedEvents, getPublishedImages } = useAdmin(); const { logout } = useAuth(); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); const handleLogout = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to logout?')) { logout(); } }; const stats = { totalAnnouncements: announcements.length, activeAnnouncements: announcements.filter(a => a.isActive).length, totalEvents: events.length, publishedEvents: getPublishedEvents().length, totalImages: galleryImages.length, publishedImages: getPublishedImages().length }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}

Admin Panel

St. Patrick's

{/* Main Content */}

{getSectionTitle(activeSection)}

Welcome, Admin
{activeSection === 'overview' && } {activeSection === 'announcements' && } {activeSection === 'events' && } {activeSection === 'gallery' && } {activeSection === 'contact' && } {activeSection === 'schedule' && } {activeSection === 'priests-desk' && } {activeSection === 'prayers' && } {activeSection === 'images' && } {activeSection === 'analytics' && } {activeSection === 'users' && }
); }; const getSectionTitle = (section: AdminSection): string => { const titles = { overview: 'Dashboard Overview', announcements: 'Manage Announcements', events: 'Manage Events', gallery: 'Manage Gallery', contact: 'Contact Information', schedule: 'Mass Schedule', 'priests-desk': 'Priest\'s Desk Messages', analytics: 'Website Analytics', prayers: 'Manage Prayers & Daily Readings', images: 'Image Management', users: 'User Management' }; return titles[section]; }; // Overview Section Component const OverviewSection: React.FC<{ stats: any; setActiveSection: (section: AdminSection) => void }> = ({ stats, setActiveSection }) => { const { getActiveAnnouncement } = useAdmin(); const activeAnnouncement = getActiveAnnouncement(); return (
{/* Quick Stats Cards */}
setActiveSection('announcements')}>
{stats.activeAnnouncements}
Active Announcements
{stats.totalAnnouncements} total
setActiveSection('events')}>
{stats.publishedEvents}
Published Events
{stats.totalEvents} total
setActiveSection('gallery')}>
{stats.publishedImages}
Gallery Images
{stats.totalImages} total
setActiveSection('users')}>
2
Active Users
System users
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

New announcement published
2 hours ago
Christmas Mass schedule updated
1 day ago
5 new gallery images uploaded
3 days ago
{/* Current Announcement Preview */} {activeAnnouncement && (

Current Active Announcement

{activeAnnouncement.type === 'urgent' && } {activeAnnouncement.type === 'info' && } {activeAnnouncement.type === 'event' && } {activeAnnouncement.type}

{activeAnnouncement.title}

{activeAnnouncement.message}

)}
); }; // Placeholder components for other sections const AnnouncementsSection: React.FC = () => (

Announcements Management

Create, edit, and manage parish announcements

); const EventsSection: React.FC = () => (

Events Management

Manage parish events and community calendar

); const GallerySection: React.FC = () => (

Gallery Management

Upload and organize parish photos

); const PriestsDeskSection: React.FC = () => { const [currentMessage, setCurrentMessage] = useState({ title: 'A Message of Hope and Unity', date: '2024-12-30', content: `Dear beloved parishioners and friends, As we approach the end of this year and look forward to 2025, I am filled with gratitude for the many blessings God has bestowed upon our parish community. Despite the challenges we have faced, our faith has remained strong, and our unity has grown deeper. The theme for 2025, "Hope does not disappoint" (Romans 5:5), reminds us that our hope is anchored in Christ. In the coming year, let us continue to be instruments of God's love and mercy in our community. Let us reach out to those in need, welcome the stranger, and be beacons of hope in our neighborhood. I encourage each of you to participate actively in our parish life - through our ministries, our liturgical celebrations, and our community outreach programs. Together, we can make St. Patrick's a true home for all who seek God's love. May God bless you and your families abundantly in the coming year. In Christ, Fr. Joseph Sibanda Parish Priest` }); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); return (

Priest's Desk Messages

setCurrentMessage({...currentMessage, title: e.target.value})} disabled={!isEditing} className="form-control" />
setCurrentMessage({...currentMessage, date: e.target.value})} disabled={!isEditing} className="form-control" />
